page.title: 09HESWALL SHOP SURVEY
page.content:
These are the results of a survey as to the types of shop to be found in Heswall (upper village). The types of shop show the sort of services and retail outlets that the people of the area required in 1985.
Clothes 25 Books 3 Food 21 Chemists 3 Building Soc. 12 Opticians 3 Furniture 8 Wool 3 Restaurants 6 Newsagents 3 Public Service 6 Solicitors 3 Hairdressers 6 Decorating 2 Fancy Goods 5 Gifts 2 Estate Agents 5 Florists 2 Electrical 5 Soft furnishings 2 Off liciences 4 Toys 2 Travel Agents 4 Funeral 2 Jewlers 4 Sports 1 Dry cleaners 4 Music 1
